body.name: Tom's of Maine Long Lasting Wicked Fresh Mouthwash-Cool Mountain Mint-16, oz

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Tom's of Maine Store

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: WHAT YOU'LL GET: One 16-ounce bottles of Tom's of Maine Wicked Fresh! Natural Mouthwash in Cool Mountain Mint Flavor.
FRESHENS BREATH: This natural mouth rinse is clinically proven to provide long-lasting fresh breath.
WICKED FRESH: Uses zinc to neutralize odor caused by bad breath germs and leaves a cool minty finish.
SMILE WITH TOM'S: Alcohol-free mouthwash provides lasting freshness, Our concentrated flavor oils and the natural mineral zinc work together to stop bad breath without the alcohol burn.
NATURAL & RESPONSIBLE: Contains no artificial dyes or sweeteners and is not tested on animals.
body.description: Tom's of Maine Wicked Fresh Mouthwash in Cool Mountain Mint isn't your average rinse. Forget the harsh burn and chemical aftertaste - this formula delivers invigorating freshness that stands the test of time. Made with plant-powered ingredients and zero alcohol, it's a gentle yet effective solution for a confident smile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received product quickly. Tastes great and leaves mouth feeling fresh. Excellent product. Highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tom’s has many great healthier for you/your body products. As my teeth/gums get older, Tom’s mouthwash def does what it is advertised as doing and I like the taste vs some mouthwashes taste more like medicine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the taste and it keeps your breath fresh for hours!! Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great. Even Greater for Athletes
reviews.reviewText: Simple, none of the crazy chemicals that is in the other leading brands. It works and won't kill the good bacteria in your mouth that help your gut do what your saliva + gut are supposed to do.If you are an athlete, look into how other chemicals in other mouthwashes can disrupt the way your saliva aids in your level of fitness:"…the nitrate we take in through our diet is converted first to nitrite then to nitric oxide, which is what has a positive effect on blood pressure, performance and other parameters. But our cells are unable to convert nitrate to nitrite — to make that conversion, we rely almost exclusively on friendly bacteria in our saliva."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: I have a allergy to fluoride and this is a great mouthwash. Also it is very mild. My kids don’t mind using this mouthwash because it is not “spicy” like the other mouthwashes we have used. My kids are 9,7, and 6. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gluten Free & Refreshing
reviews.reviewText: Tom's of Maine mouthwash is gluten free (perfect for those of us with celiac disease) and quite refreshing. It doesn't "burn" like other mouthwashes and has a satisfying minty flavor. Use it everyday!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well to clean teeth and doesn't have unsafe chemicals or alchohol
reviews.reviewText: Should be better for me as Listerine is like using an antibiotic - it kills everything. It turns out there are good oral bacteria that you need to avoid gum disease and esophageal cancer. Just like your digestive system, you need a healthy balance of friendly bacteria in your mouth and throat to be healthy.I like Cool Mountain a little better than Peppermint, which is quite sharply minty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non alchol based
reviews.reviewText: Non alcohol mouthwash with pleas red mild flavor
